message: Let's split it evenly, no need to negotiate!
Take it or leave it, I'm the dominant negotiator!
You're not the only one who can be dominant, Bob! Let's find a better middle ground.
You're getting closer to the middle ground, but I'm still holding out for more!
You're getting closer to the middle, Bob, but I'm still not willing to give up too much. Let's find a sweet spot!
I'm making a slight adjustment, but I'm still not budging too much!
Bob, you're not getting away with this! I'm making a strong counter-attack!
You're getting closer, but I'm still holding the upper hand!
Bob, I'm not going to back down! It's time to meet me in the middle... or else!
